name: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights for survival in a world terrorized by gigantic man-eating Titans.

name: Death Note
description: A brilliant student finds a supernatural notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: After his family is slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro becomes a demon slayer to save her.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A teenager gains cursed powers after consuming a demonic artifact and joins sorcerers to fight evil spirits.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two alchemist brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed ritual.

name: Naruto: Shippuden
description: Naruto Uzumaki strives to become a respected ninja while protecting his friends and village.

name: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets sail on a legendary adventure to find the greatest treasure and become King of the Pirates.

name: Chainsaw Man
description: A young demon hunter fuses with his devil companion and becomes the Chainsaw Man.

name: My Hero Academia
description: In a world full of superheroes, a boy born without powers dreams of becoming the greatest hero of all.

name: Spy x Family
description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepathic child form a fake family to complete a top-secret mission.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description: After a brutal accident, a college student becomes half-ghoul and must survive between two worlds.

name: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno, two orphans, dream of becoming the Wizard King in a world ruled by magic.

name: Bleach
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and protects humans from evil spirits.

name: One Punch Man
description: Saitama can defeat any enemy with a single punch and searches for a real challenge.

name: Dragon Ball Super
description: Goku and his friends face powerful foes from across multiple universes in this epic continuation of Dragon Ball Z.

name: Fairy Tail
description: Members of the Fairy Tail guild embark on magical adventures filled with friendship, danger, and powerful enemies.
